item.title: The Big Picture: These Eagles' Super Bowl Hopes Rest on Their Defense
item.description: The Eagles' offense is struggling heading into the playoffs. Is their great defense good enough to lead them to another title?

item.title: The Big Picture: Somehow, the Spiraling Buccaneers Can Still Win the NFC South
item.description: Loser of seven of their last eight games, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers can somehow still make the playoffs.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the 49ers' Win Over the Bears
item.description: The 49ers played one of the most entertaining games of the season against the Bears. Here are the takeaways.

item.description: Here is the best of the best from NFL Week 17, starring Drake Maye and Derrick Henry.
